Body:
joined = join_fragments(*fragments)
assert joined == expected_value
pytest.mark.parametrize('fragments,expected_value', [[['a'], '/a'], [['a',
    'b', 'c', 'd'], '/a/b/c/d'], [['a', None, 'b', 'c', '', 'd'],
    '/a/b/c/d'], [[b'a', b'b', b'c', b'd'], '/a/b/c/d'], [[b'a', 'b', 'c',
    b'd'], '/a/b/c/d'], [['hello/world', 'today'], '/hello/world/today'], [
    [b'hello/world', b'today'], '/hello/world/today'], [['//hello///world',
    '/today/'], '/hello/world/today']])
